meanings.definition: Give official permission for or approval to.
meanings.sent1: The teacher authorizes the students to leave early.
meanings.sent2: The manager authorizes the purchase of new equipment.
meanings.sent3: The principal authorizes a surprise pizza party for the students.
meanings.sent4: The judge authorizes the release of new evidence in court.
meanings.sent5: The government authorizes the construction of a new bridge.

meanings.definition: Endow someone with the authority to act on one's behalf.
meanings.sent1: The CEO authorizes the assistant to sign documents on their behalf.
meanings.sent2: The parent authorizes the babysitter to make decisions for their child.
meanings.sent3: The superhero authorizes their sidekick to use their powers in emergencies.
meanings.sent4: The author authorizes the editor to make changes to the manuscript.
meanings.sent5: The captain authorizes the first mate to steer the ship during the storm.
